extendedInfo.description: Recite Holy Quran with actual experience, just like an actual Quran in your palm.Elegant style, real page flip effect and smooth nastaliq font for full page readability. Don't bother yourself by scrolling up and down, now easily recite as actual printed Quran.Most of the applications require external data download after installation of about 50mb to 500mb, but HOLY QURAN doesnât need any external data download after installation. This is only a single file download from Play store, just install and enjoy the appEnglish and Urdu version of Holy Quran and Hadiths will be available soon. We warmly welcome your suggestions and support, send your feedback and suggestions to fanzetech@gmail.comPlease remember us in your prayers.Keywords: Islam,  Quran,  Quran-e-Kareem,  Quran Majeed,  Religion,  Religious

reviews.title: Great app plz add n extra feature
reviews.comment: Jazakallah khair for this great app, my dear brother\'s it would be really helpful if you add a feature to see ruku, so that if I had to stop in middle I can remember by ruku\'s... and later on continue with the small Surahs in evening like surah waqia, mulk... may Allah reward you guys with good...
reviews.author: Mohammed asim

reviews.title: Its sending Alerts and sharing data with telemarketer
reviews.comment: Developers,  you got to stop selling this data and stop taking  advantage of the people who are not reading the fine prints. This app is reading and tracking the phone numbers and device information and tracking all incoming calls and possibly texts and the Contacts list. I got two three Alerts a day that I won something,  or get free by filling out a form. Unbelievable that you take advantage of religion like that.
reviews.author: Mohsin Khan

reviews.comment: Alhamdulillah what a nice job done by develop.  May Allah give you all happiness of this world and after.
reviews.author: hanzala anwar

reviews.title: Sony Experia tipo
reviews.comment: A good app. But there are few option from the pull up menu  does not seems to work in this mobile..such as \" GO to \" and \" RATE \" does not response. Just a information for the developer to have a look at it.. Thanks for the hard work.
reviews.author: Zia Zam

reviews.title: Stupid Ads
reviews.comment: Every day you get at least 5 ads pushed to your phone even if you don\'t open the app
reviews.author: Farzana Bismillah

reviews.comment: I find the font more understandable since I was trained in it. The lack of being able to use bookmarks has forced me to use iQuran for the purpose since it also has recitation. I can bookmark a page in this app. If I can bookmark an ayah then I wouldnt have to use 2 apps to allow me the functionality I need.
reviews.author: Asif Abbasi

reviews.title: P3100
reviews.comment: Its superb application, feel like quran experience.
